IKd0eYyfKUgcIgXwFUoDgI1TePp2.description: We are looking for a MERN Stack Developer to build and maintain scalable web applications.

GoodSpace AI is an AI-powered hiring platform helping job seekers find jobs faster and companies hire pre-screened, AI-interviewed candidates within 24 hours. As we scale, weâ€™re looking for a skilled Frontend Developer to help build world-class user experiences for millions of job seekers. Role Overview We are hiring a Frontend Developer who is passionate about creating clean, fast, and intuitive UI. You will work closely with the product, backend, and design teams to deliver high-quality web and app experiences using modern frontend technologies. Key Responsibilities Develop responsive, high-performance UI for web and mobile interfaces. Convert UI/UX designs from Figma into functional, pixel-perfect components. Build reusable, modular, and scalable frontend components. Optimize application performance and page load times. Collaborate with backend engineers to integrate REST APIs and GraphQL (if applicable). Ensure cross-browser compatibility and mobile responsiveness. Maintain code quality through proper testing and best practices. Stay updated with the latest frontend trends and tools. Required Skills & Experience 0-3 years of experience in frontend development. Strong proficiency in React.js / Next.js (preferred stack). Good knowledge of HTML5, CSS3, JavaScript (ES6+). Experience with state management: Redux / Zustand / Context API. Familiarity with TailwindCSS, Material UI, or similar UI libraries. Experience integrating APIs and working with JSON. Understanding of performance optimization and frontend debugging. Ability to write clean, modular, and maintainable code. Nice-to-Have Skills Experience with TypeScript. Familiarity with React Native (big plus). Knowledge of SEO, SSR, and SSG in Next.js. Experience with version control: Git/GitHub. Basic understanding of backend or cloud services (Node.js, Firebase, AWS)
